動物用藥品名稱: 西華雞新城病活毒疫苗(LASOTA株)
業者名稱: 法商西華股份有限公司台灣分公司
ingredients: NEWCASTLE DISEASE VIRUS STRAIN LASOTA....AT LEAST 10^5.5 EID50
成分: THE VACCINE CONTAINS THE LASOTA STRAIN OF NEWCASTLE DISEASEVIRUS IN LIVE, FREEZE-DRIED FORM. THE EMBRYONATED CHICKEN EGGSUSED IN THE PRODUCTION OF THE VACCINE ARE OBTAINED FROM SPECIFIC-PATHOGEN-FREE (SPF) FLOCKS.ONE DOSE CONTAINS:
